definitions.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a flat sounding box with numerous strings placed on a horizontal surface , played with a plectrum or fingertips .
Related or similar instruments in other cultures , such as the Chinese guqin or Norwegian harpeleik ; especially any chordophone without a neck, and with strings that pass over the body.

main_definition: ( music ) A musical instrument consisting of a flat sounding box with numerous strings placed on a horizontal surface , played with a plectrum or fingertips .
